material.mattext: Let us assume that there are two types of menu utilized on the site: "left" and "right". If for "left" menu of the section "Company news" (/about/news/) no description file (file with menu items) is created than:
only the "top" menu will be displayed in this section
"left" menu of the superposed (parental) section will be used as the section "left" menu
there will be shown no menu in this section
the "left" menu will be generated with use of the "top" menu description file
